message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $135. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and quality.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, I am unable to accept your offer at $110. However, I would like to propose an alternative at $125. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I understand your proposal, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to consider $115?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After reviewing your latest offer, I've decided to counter with $120. This is the highest price I can offer considering the value and quality of the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
